com.veeplay.drm.marlin

Class MarlinManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veeplay.drm.marlin.MarlinManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.appscend.hub.KRAdapter, com.appscend.utilities.UnitManager

    public class MarlinManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.appscend.utilities.UnitManager, com.appscend.hub.KRAdapter
    The MarlinManager class is a singleton managing the Marlin DRM plugin for Veeso
    Author:
    andreimarinescu

      • getInstance

      • init

        public void init(Activity targetActivity)
        Initialize the Marlin SDK. Should be run at the same time with the initialization of the Veeso player.
        Parameters:
        targetActivity - The activity the singleton is going to bind to for context.

      • start

        public void start(com.appscend.media.events.APSMediaUnit unit)
        Method that should be called in order to download the Marlin XML ActionToken and acquire the license for playing the video file. This method is called automatically by the Veeso player, and normally should not be called from the implementation code.
        Specified by:
        start in interface com.appscend.utilities.UnitManager
        Parameters:
        unit - An APSMediaUnit containing a MarlinDRM encoded string
